name: ips-figuras-sst-cucuta-sas-web
description: Sistema web para IPS Figuras SST

scripts.dev:modules: concurrently "npm run dev:react" "npm run dev:features" "npm run dev:token"
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:modules
scripts.build:modules: npm run build:react && npm run build:features && npm run build:token
scripts.install:modules: cd ips-figuras-sst-cucuta/react-hybrid-app && npm install && cd ../advanced-features && npm install && cd ../Token && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules dist && npm run clean:modules
scripts.clean:modules: cd ips-figuras-sst-cucuta/react-hybrid-app && rimraf node_modules dist && cd ../advanced-features && rimraf node_modules dist && cd ../Token && rimraf node_modules dist
